physicsResources.name: Khan Academy Physics
physicsResources.description: Free comprehensive physics courses covering various topics from basic to advanced levels.

physicsResources.name: MIT OpenCourseWare
physicsResources.description: Free access to MIT's undergraduate and graduate-level physics course materials.

physicsResources.name: Physics Classroom
physicsResources.description: Comprehensive physics tutorials with interactive simulations and problem-solving exercises.

physicsResources.name: Feynman Lectures on Physics
physicsResources.description: Classic physics lectures by Richard Feynman, covering a wide range of topics.

physicsResources.name: PhET Interactive Simulations
physicsResources.description: Free interactive physics simulations to visualize and explore various concepts.

physicsResources.name: edX Physics Courses
physicsResources.description: A variety of physics courses from top universities, ranging from introductory to advanced topics.

physicsResources.name: HyperPhysics
physicsResources.description: Comprehensive physics reference with concept maps and detailed explanations.

physicsResources.name: Brilliant.org Physics
physicsResources.description: Problem-solving based courses covering various physics topics with increasing difficulty.

physicsResources.name: ArXiv Physics
physicsResources.description: Open-access archive for scholarly articles in physics and related fields.

physicsResources.name: Physics Stack Exchange
physicsResources.description: Community-driven question and answer site for physics researchers, academics, and students.
